SEARCH
Package account

Class Loan

java.lang.Object
account.Loan
public class Loan extends Object
The Loan class represents a customer's loan information and operations related to loans It is linked to the account class and has methods to apply for new loans, perform and track Loan payments.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Loan

      public Loan(double principalAmount, float interestRate, int termInMonths, int accountID)
      Constructs a new Loan object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      principalAmount - the principal amount of the Loan
      interestRate - the annual interest rate of the Loan
      termInMonths - the Loan term in months
      accountID - the accountID associated with the Loan

    • checkEligiblity

      public static boolean checkEligiblity(int creditScore)
      Check Eligiblity of customer to apply for Loan. If customer's credit score is higher than or equal to 600, customer is eligible for a Loan. Otherwise, customer is not eligble for a Loan
      Parameters:
      creditScore - The credit score of the customer applying for the Loan.
      Returns:
      True if customer is eligible for a Loan, otherwise return false.

    • applyForLoan

      public static Loan applyForLoan(double principalAmount, float interestRate, int termInMonths, int accountID, int creditScore)
      Applies for new Loan.
      Parameters:
      principalAmount - The principal amount of the Loan.
      interestRate - The annual interest rate for the Loan.
      termInMonths - The Loan term in months.
      accountID - The accountID of customer applying for the Loan.
      creditScore - The credit score of customer applying for the Loan.
      Returns:
      Loan object for successful application, otherwise return null.

    • approveLoan

      public void approveLoan()
      Approves the Loan and updates the status of the Loan from "Pending" to "Approved".

    • rejectLoan

      public void rejectLoan()
      Rejects the Loan and updates the status of the Loan from "Pending" to "Rejected".

    • displayInfo

      public void displayInfo()
      Displays information about the Loan.

    • printAmortizationSchedule

      public void printAmortizationSchedule()
      Prints amortization schedule of the Loan. Uses standard amortization formular to compute the amount that needs to be paid based on a schedule.

    • addPaymentDate

      public void addPaymentDate(LocalDate paymentDate)
      Adds payment date to the list of payment dates for the Loan. This is used to track the dates when payment is made.
      Parameters:
      paymentDate - The payment date to be added to the list of payment dates.

    • repay

      public double repay(double balance)
      Repays the monthly payment of the Loan, updating the Account Balance after deduction. Date of payment is added to the list of paymentDates to keep track. Before payment is made, the current date will be compared to the list of payment dates to ensure customer does not pay more than once a month.
      Parameters:
      balance - The balance of the account to deduct balance for repayment of the Loan.
      Returns:
      Returns the deducted balance of the loan

    • calculateAmortizationPayment

      public double calculateAmortizationPayment()
      Calculates the monthly amortization payment of the Loan.
      Returns:
      The calculated monthly amortization payment

    • readLoansFromCSV

      public static Loan readLoansFromCSV(int accountID)
      Reads list of Loans from CSV file and returns a Loan object that matches the specified accountID and have the "Approved" status.
      Parameters:
      accountID - The accountID of the specified customer to retrieve Loans associated with the specified account.
      Returns:
      A loan object if it matches the accountID entered and has the "Approved" status.
